  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3390</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An experience between science and art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Erfahrung zwischen Wissenschaft und kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une expérience entre la science et l'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma experiência entre a ciência e a arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esperienza fra scienza ed arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εμπειρία μεταξύ της επιστήμης και της τέχνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una experiencia entre la ciencia y el arte</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Neuroscape exhibits at the Bloomfield Museum of Science -with two online views of the "looking and drawing" and "looking and photographing" exhibits</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">museum exhibition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neurons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microscopy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photographs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Neuroscape Ausstellungen am Bloomfield Museum
der Wissenschaft - mit zwei Onlineansichten des "Schauens und des 
Zeichnens" und "des Schauens und des Fotografierens" der 
Ausstellungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les objets exposés de Neuroscape au musée de 
Bloomfield de la Science - avec deux vues en ligne de "regarder et de 
dessiner" et de "regarder et de photographier" des objets exposés</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As exibições de Neuroscape no museu de 
Bloomfield da ciência - com duas vistas em linha de "olhar e de 
desenhar" e de "olhar e de fotografar" exibições</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le esposizioni di Neuroscape al museo di 
Bloomfield di scienza - con due viste in linea "del osservare e di 
dissipare" e "di osservare e di fotografare" le esposizioni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα εκθέματα Neuroscape στο μουσείο Bloomfield της 
επιστήμης - με δύο σε απευθείας σύνδεση όψεις του "κοιτάγματος 
και σχεδιασμόσ" και "του κοιτάγματος και της φωτογράφισησ" των 
εκθεμάτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los objetos expuestos de Neuroscape en el museo 
de Bloomfield de la ciencia - con dos propósitos en línea de "mirar 
y de trazar" y de "mirar y de fotografiar" objetos expuestos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Museum Ausstellung</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Neuronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
